meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unbounded.
meanings.sent1: The unboundedness of his imagination allowed him to create endless worlds in his stories.
meanings.sent2: The unboundedness of the ocean filled her with a sense of freedom and awe.
meanings.sent3: The unboundedness of the buffet left him happily full but slightly regretful.
meanings.sent4: Her unboundedness of kindness knew no bounds, touching everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The unboundedness of the sky at night, filled with stars, was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: The condition of having no limits or boundaries.
meanings.sent1: The unboundedness of the desert seemed to stretch on forever under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: In the vast unboundedness of space, the possibilities for exploration are endless.
meanings.sent3: The unboundedness of the cookie jar was a temptation too great to resist.
meanings.sent4: His unboundedness of energy was like a never-ending battery, always ready to go.
meanings.sent5: The unboundedness of her love enveloped him like a warm embrace, comforting and secure.
